form.h3: This HIT is a brief survey.

ul.li: Select the link below to complete a survey on demographics and political opinions.
At the end of the survey, you will receive a code to paste into the box below to be compensated. Make sure to leave this window open as you complete the survey.

form.h3: Taking this survey may qualify you for an additional HIT ($2 with $1 bonus).

ul.li: If you are qualified, you need to return promptly at TIME HERE to complete the follow up HIT.
The follow up HIT will ask you to have an 8 minute written, online discussion with another Worker or write a short essay.
The follow up HIT will be titled Follow up HIT: Conversation/short essay
